attributes.title: ILLINOIS DOMESTIC VIOLENCE FATALITY REVIEW COMMITTEE: Jan 17, 2023
attributes.summary:
Public notice is hereby given that the Illinois Domestic Violence Fatality Review Committee will conduct
a public meeting on 1/17/2023, at 1:00 pm by Zoom. All interested parties are invited to attend and will
be given the opportunity for public comment.
attributes.body:
Public notice is hereby given that the Illinois Domestic Violence Fatality Review Committee will conduct
a public meeting on 1/17/2023, at 1:00 pm by Zoom. All interested parties are invited to attend and will
be given the opportunity for public comment.
attributes.rawText: public notice is hereby given that the illinois domestic violence fatality review committee will conduct a public meeting on 1 17 2023 at 1 00 pm by zoom all interested parties are invited to attend and will be given the opportunity for public comment
